mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX
  • Processor: 500 Mhz
  • Graphics: integrated graphics
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Required
  • Additional Notes: Your computer must be able to play mp3 files

name: Black Hole Hazard Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows xp or greater
  • Processor: 500 Mhz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: integrated graphics
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Required
  • Additional Notes: Your computer must be able to play mp3 files

short_description: The original soundtrack to Black Hole Hazard! 18 tracks spanning over 41 minutes. Provided in mp3 format.
